trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: 清除清單時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>方法的<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入或移除項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty and non-modifiable instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得空白且不可修改的執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入位於指定索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入至集合時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>方法的<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the `item` is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引位置`item`插入。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中移除指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除某個項目時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>方法的<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取代指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中設定項目時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>方法的<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的項目新值。
